information: The company AgriProTech specialises in the manufacture and marketing of bird and pest scaring systems to protect crops. It develops autonomous, lastingly effective products for professionals in the agricultural sector. This is the case of acoustic scarers, AviTrac® that are currently sold in France and Europe. These devices emit sounds that scare away pest bird species (crows, pigeons, starlings, seagulls, etc.) and protect areas of up to 3 hectares. Designed for indoor and outdoor environments (IP55 waterproof junction box), these acoustic devices are fully programmable: transmission interval, operating times, sound signals and volume, etc. The different AviTrac® models are all delivered with a stainless steel frame that can be dismantled and folded away. These products have been especially designed for agriculture (cereal farmers, livestock farmers, market gardeners, etc.).
products: Gel répulsif olfactif anti-pigeons | Filet de protection contre les oiseaux | Effaroucheur sonore anti-oiseaux | Effaroucheur sonore anti-oiseaux | Ballon effaroucheur anti-oiseaux | Ruban holographique effaroucheur anti-oiseaux | Ballons effaroucheurs anti-oiseaux
